channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Proposed Federal THC Ban Would ‘Wipe Out’ Hemp Products That Get People High
item.description: The provision, tucked into the spending bill that could end the US government shutdown, would ban intoxicating hemp-derived THC products, including gu...

item.title: Court rules that OpenAI violated German copyright law; ordered it to pay damages
item.description: A German court ruled that OpenAI’s ChatGPT violated the nation’s copyright laws by training its language models on licensed musical work without permi...

item.title: Microsoft’s Surface Laptop Is Marked Down by $350
item.description: Scoop this excellent Windows laptop for a fraction of its usual price.

item.title: DHS Kept Chicago Police Records for Months in Violation of Domestic Espionage Rules
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security collected data on Chicago residents accused of gang ties to test if police files could feed an FBI watchlist. Mont...

item.title: iOS 26.2 beta adds new Liquid Glass customization, alarms in the Reminders app, and more
item.description: Apple released the iOS 26.2 beta 1 last week, introducing the option to adjust the Liquid Glass appearance of the lock screen clock, and more.

item.title: Anthropic’s Claude Takes Control of a Robot Dog
item.description: Anthropic believes AI models will increasingly reach into the physical world. To understand where things are headed, it asked Claude to program a quad...

item.title: ElevenLabs strike deals with celebs to create AI audio
item.description: ElevenLabs struck a deal with actors Michael Caine and Matthew McConaughey to AI-generate their voices.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X botched its security key switchover, locking users out
item.description: As part of an effort to retire the old Twitter.com domain, X is requiring passkey and security key users to re-enroll — but are getting stuck in endle...

item.title: Our Favorite Travel and Outdoor Gear Is on Sale at Huckberry
item.description: Huckberry’s eclectic curation of travel clothing, coffee gear, and backpacks are all on sale right now.

item.title: Cybersecurity firm Deepwatch lays off dozens, citing move to “accelerate” AI investment
item.description: Deepwatch’s CEO told TechCrunch that the layoffs allow the company to accelerate investments in “AI and automation.”
